content.detailedDescription: Was watching tv, the sabres hockey game. at the end of the second period i got up and looked out the front window looking due south, something we do a lot . we live out in the country and enjoy watching the deer feed under our bird feeder. it was a clear cold dark nite. no clouds. once i pulled the curtains open, i saw this very bright pulsating light just above the tree line to the south south east. we have binoculars on the window sill for viewing critters. i looked thru them and watched the pulsating light and noticed a police car thru the woods on keller hill rd with the lights flashing, i believe they were pretty close to each other.  i watched the pulsating light and the patrol car then the pulsating light moved up slightly and moved slightly to the left and east. at this point it turned bright yellow hovered for 30 seconds, blinked twice and was gone. this sighting lasted about one min.
content.summary: Pulsating white red yellow, moved up and to the left turned bright yellow blinked twice than it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
My mom and i were heading back from the casino at about 11:46 pm, i was driving and my mom was wide awake we both did not consume alcohol at the casino. 

we were on highway 219 and just before the road takes a bend to straighten out to the north, what seemed to be a car got onto the road. for a second i didn't think anything of it but then i am like how the hell did it just merge onto the highway at that speed, i was going 100 so this vehicle would have been going 120-150km/h and it didn't slow down when it dashed onto the road. 

so i ask my mom "what the hell is that a ski-doo?" as it appeared to me to be in the field by the road (i was unaware that there was a bend in the road coming up), and she says "what that small car?" and i say "what it can't be a car it looks small like a ski-doo or 4 wheeler. so we turn our attention to the side of the road and there are signs coming up so i say "that must be the road it came from" but turns out it is not a road at all, it is where the road starts to take a bend. my mom then says there were no roads as she was watching her side of the road after it turned cause she thought it looked strange too.

so then i speed up trying to catch up to it and it looks like it is following the bend in the road (and explains why i thought it was traveling in the field). but it is impossible after we hit 110, in the distance we both noticed a white van waiting at a 4 way intersection to cross the road and for what seemed like a second i looked at the van then back at the road and there was nothing there the vehicle vanished. my mom said the same thing to me that she looked at the van then back at the road and it was gone. 

as we crossed the 4 way intersection we looked down both ways and saw no vehicles. i sped up again to 120 to try and see if we meet up with any cars ahead of me but there was nothing. 

this vehicle came onto the road ahead of us quite a ways away i would say it would not be too affected by my high beams. seemed my low lights could not reach it. we didn't see the shape of the vehicle or any light glares from their front. just two rectangular octagonal red lights in the back which were outline looking. the back lights never went out of our sight until we noticed the white van. this vehicle appeared to be very small.
content.summary: Could have been a car but seems impossible.

content.detailedDescription: Im from chgo,live by one of chgo's airports.On november 22 2012,i was watching tv around 2.30am when i noticed a white light in the eastern sky ,my living room faces east.Moving north to south,i thought it was a helicopter so it didn't strike me as strange it seemed to move as such.I also have a back ground in aviation (pilots licence).As this light moved north to south it stopped then moved back south to north then stopped and hovered there for a while.After about a hour it seemed strange it was in the same position.So i got up and got my binoculars to see if i could see it.I couldn't judge the distance or elevation ,but my guess was this light was out over lake michigan i did at this time see a airplane traveling east then bank north.When i seen the white light fade away,only to come back at a higher elevation,then fade again.Then thats when the light show started green then blue ,red.Yellow ,orange all seemed to be on dimmer switches fading out only to reappear in a different spot.Then they started forming shapes like a diamond shape then a rectangular form and others .This lasted till about the time the sun started to rise and at that time the lights all started to fade away with the white light being the last to go.At one point i really didn't believe what i was looking at so i woke my brother up to look at what i was seeing wasn't my imagination and he seen it too.I was so amazed at what i saw ,that i waited up for the next two nights to see if the lights came back and they did.What seemed strange is i called the airport and asked if they seen any lights in the eastern skies and they said no,i felt kinda like a crackpot calling them and asking them that.I never seen them again, even tho i look all the time in that direction.Then on evening i was wathching a ufo program of lights over tinley park which is close to me ,when they showed film footage of the lights and they were exactly the same ones i had seen,it sent a shiver down my spine.In a million years i never thought i would be one of those people who witnessed this sort of thing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights on eastern horizon

content.detailedDescription:
In july of 1980 my husband, our 2 year old son and i were traveling north on highway 101 (coast hwy) from florence, oregon to yachats, oregon to stay at a cabin belonging to my in-laws. approximately 12 miles north of florence, i noticed some lights shining through tall fir trees on the west side of the highway.  as we got closer it seemed unusual because we were too close to the ocean for any houses, and there were many bright lights of various colors.  

i remember telling my husband that it looked like something hovering in the sky.  he took his eye off the road and eventually stopped in the middle of the highway.  we just stared at it in amazement. i told him it must be a ufo and to try to remember what it looked like so we could draw it when we got to the cabin.  then i realized that we could get hit sitting in the middle of the highway.  i'm not sure how long we were there.  he pulled the pickup off on the the right shoulder and we watched some more. the object was huge. we were shock. it's hard to say how big it was, but i would guess that it was at least the size of a baseball field...Just a guess.  i could easily see various lights flickering that were in a circular arrangement around a spherical shaped object consisting of several levels. light streamed out off of the various colored lights. the best i can remember is that the colors were blue, yellow, reddish-pink and various colors of white. 

not long after we pulled off the road, we decided to move our pickup forward up the highway past the trees to get a better look. just at that time the object moved quickly north and behind a bluff.  we were unable to see it again.

during this time our son remained asleep. we were shaking until we reached the cabin. once there we each took crayons and pencils and drew pictures in separate rooms to see how similar they were. when we say each others pictures they were quite similar. he had more light coming off the craft from underneath.  i slept soundly that night, but my husband said he was restless all night and felt the cabin shake. i didn't have any recollection of the cabin shaking. 

today some 34 years later it is still vivid to me.Some details of the ship are lost, but the lights, the size, the lack of sound, the location and the feeling i had at the time are still very real today. i am still surprised we sat in the middle of the hwy for so long, not thinking about being hit, and with not other traffic to speak of.
content.summary: Traveling in pickup north along hwy 101 near florence,oregon. object seen through trees over the ocean to the west by husband and self.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the west side of my house looking west when an almost perfectly round, fire colored object caught my eye.  my first instinct was that it was an aircraft on fire.  as i watched it move from north to south i realized that it wasn't an aircraft and the color was as if you were looking at fire during the daylight but it was full dark.  it wasn't as bright as fire would bye at night and there were no flames trailing.  all color was contained in what appeared to be a perfect circle.  the craft appeared to be approximately 3000 ft. altitude, from 1 to 3 miles away, cruising straight and level at between 180 and 220 knots, north to south.  it was silent.  a neighbors dog, in the next lot north, barked for the first time i ever heard.  the size of the craft and speed are hard to estimate because i'm not sure how far away it was and had no reference. i was 
 absolutely focused on the object as i walked north in my yard and watched it disappear to the south into some scattered clouds,  approximately 7 miles southwest.  this property is just south of daytona international in very busy air space.  i have been a professional pilot for 17 years.  i taught in the airspace and at the time was a corporate pilot  flying a falcon 2000 out of kdab.  i had lived in the house for 11 years and have seen just about any aircraft you can think of fly by at one time or another.  i have never seen anything like this, ever, in flight or on the ground.  it's the only craft in my career that i don't have any idea what it was.  i called the port orange police department to see if they had any other reports of strange flying objects.  they didn't have any other reports however they did send an officer to take my report.  the next day i called the daytona tower to find out if they had any information on the event.  the man i talked to said he was personally in the tower at the time, 2035, the previous night and had seen nothing.  he was snide and condescending.  i expected  more from another aviation professional.  from the direction the craft came from it should have flown by the kdab tower.  it was in there airspace when i first noticed it.  after that experience, being disbelieved by the air traffic controller, i dropped the issue.  for some reason i am compelled to report the incident now. so i have.  note that the month and day are very approximate.  it was a long time ago.  the time of day is correct.
content.summary: Observed round, silent, fire colored, object approx. 1 to 2 miles away, moving north to south , straight and level, approx. 3000 ft., approx. 200 knots.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a friends back yard and in the sky i seen what looked similar to a plane flying pretty slow but it was glowing bright red/orange almost looked like the whole craft was on fire it also left a trail off the back like a comet does.

i thought maybe it was a plane that caught on fire and would eventually crash but nothing on the news. i forgot about it for about a year until i over heard somebody talking about witnessing the same thing i saw and describing it in the same way so i went on facebook and made a status asking any of my friends if they have seen anything weird flying in the sky at all (keep in mind i did not discribe what i had seen, i only asked if anyone had seen anything at all, nothing specific) within an hour i had 5 different people describing to me the same exact thing i had seen a year before. out of the 5 people 4 of them were in a group 1 was alone i think we have a hotspot over here
content.summary: Plane like craft glowing red/orange as if engulfed in flames moving in a normal flight pattern but leaving a trail

content.detailedDescription:
I have contacted mufon with a detailed description of the event i experienced.All i got was a thank you and sales pitches.Its been 6 years and ive told no one my story.The whole time wanting to know more wanting to know the truth knowing in my heart what is really going on
confiding in youre orginazation.Hoping for exeptance and help.I realized is nothing but a dissapointment.Again i have to serch for the truth and serch for someone that isnt out to profit but honestly want to know the truth.Its possible that your orginazation knows the truth and choses to profit from peoples stories.Dissapointing verry dissapointing.
sincerely.
 miles batson
content.summary: Driving saw oragish red light in rear view merror last rememberd until we came to hours later

content.detailedDescription: It was at the date that comet ison was to have passed the sun.I was beginning work outside at a construction site.I was in the habit of looking to the skies by this point.Glancing around as i did my work,i spotted the object. two co-workers were in the area,and i alerted them,then grabbed my camera and filmed what i thought was ison. the object headed to the horizon where the sun was rising.A second object seemed to be heading to intercept the path from the east. the tail was the main observation .It seemed almost plasma -like i stopped filming to phone my wife so she could maybe witness it as well.I saw the object dissappear into the sunrise. the internet was saying the ison event was not going to happen.When i transferred my footage to my computer ,on the big screen near the end of the clip, the object appears to make a course change. now i am confused.
content.summary: Caught my eye,alerted two co-workers,and began filming with digital camera

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went outside tonight in our driveway around 930pm to have a smoke and as we just started outside i had looked up because a light caught my eye over our house but very high up, i though at that moment in my mind i might have been seeing a shooting star, it was very very quick and not a sound, just as i was saying to my husband did you see that!.. he was like yeah but was looking to my left, i said how something just shot super fast over head.. then he said no i was looking over there and pointed nw directed and said he saw a green glow in the sky that hovered and then descended down. what i saw flashed from se to nw.  where he said the light descended was i'd say closer to bucks county area that directed from our home in philly.  it wasn't something close to check out. i believe we saw the same thing, i saw the flash and then he saw it go down.  it wasn't a plane or a helicopter or anything like that, like i said i would have chalked it up to be a shooting star other then my husband seeing a descent. my feeling are i don't know what it was and i've never seen a ufo before, but those few seconds were cool.
content.summary: Flash of light in the sky over our home in philly and descend far away

content.detailedDescription:
June 11, 2013
i went to bed early and woke up at 11:03 p.M. due to an intense feeling of arousal.  i awoke because of these feelings and wondered why i had them because the dreams i was having didn���t coincide with them.  they wouldn���t subside.  i thought this was highly unusual so i decided to get up and take a look around to see if i could find anything that may be causing this.  i didn���t see anything in the house, but my instincts told me to look out the back door (i live in a national forest & my backyard is the forest).  i saw nothing to my left nor in front of me but there, there to the right, there it was.  i couldn���t believe it.  nearly 150��� away and 20��� off the ground was an orange orb.  i thought that since i saw it and made a noise opening the sliding glass door and its accompanying screen door it would disappear but it didn���t.  i still had those feelings and i was becoming aggravated.  never had i experienced a duration of this sensation that wasn���t prompted by what is considered usual/normal.   the orb looked like it was about 3���wide at the distance i was viewing it.  i kept looking at it trying to observe if there were any changes in it or if i could seen anything around it even a plausible shadow.  if i had to speculate on a speculation it would seem that the orb provoked a situation that produced energy and by its reaction it seemed to collect the energy.  i have ready many things and i find that orbs are around volcanoes, are seen at earthquake faults, have been photographed around children playing, and have been around a mine cave-in in which minors lost their lives.  i have heard on a popular t.V. show���to paraphrase, the gods came down from the sky, we received technology from them, and we have offered blood sacrifice.  in a blood sacrifice energy is given off.  i wonder how much a person or group of persons would offer up in exchange for technology.
the things i noticed about the orb were that it had a hard edge to it.  by that i mean that it had no haze surrounding it; the light didn���t extend beyond its parameter.  it was enveloped in the forests blackness.  i saw a couple of very interesting things about this orb that really struck me.  the first was that: if you would imagine yourself putting your finger in the centre and drew a craggy line from that point to the outer edge then another from the same starting point to the orbs edge separated by about 10 degrees that section was brighter than the sections that weren���t in the craggy areas.  this one was at the 2:00 o���clock position.  there was another of these with lesser degrees at the 7:00 o���clock position. when viewing the orb i saw no change in it and i wondered why it was there and i wondered why it enabled me to view it for so long.  since it was there i thought ���ok, let���s play���.  i looked at it and tried to direct intense energy toward it.  it flared up with the craggy sections lighting up even more brightly than the rest of the orb.  i repeated this several times and the orb duplicated its action each time.  i wondered if i was going to make it angry or curious.  i didn���t want to make it come closer.   i ran into the other room where i had my night vision stored.  i looked through it and saw nothing yet, when i put the night vision down, i saw the orb.  i repeated this several times all with the same result.  i found out that this was because night vision sees low energy and the orb was high energy.  i was growing tired and ceased trying to send energy to it.  i was delighted when my feelings of arousal had ended.  the second interesting thing was that the very instant my physical feelings ended the orb immediately turned white.  it flickered white like a like a short circuit would act.  each time that it flickered more of it seemed to be gone until finally only part of its rim showed then it completely flicked out.  i slipped off to bed.  on succeeding nights i looked out and didn���t see it at the times i went out.  i took a metal detector out on the 14th.  the detector didn���t pick up anything and i didn���t see anything on the ground or surrounding plants unless i missed something but i did notice that the air was electrified.  the hair on my arms reacted.
june 27, 2013
at 2:03 a.M.  i awoke to a calling out of something i never heard before.  again, i live in the woods and i���m familiar with the sounds of the forest.  these calls were broadcast at regular spaced intervals and had a faint human quality to it.  i woke my husband and asked if he heard anything.  he said he never heard anything like it and that it sounded really, really scary.  we stayed in place and continued to listen for a while for further calls.  the onset of each call was preceded with a strong heavy rasp.  the last of its calls was followed by coyotes that seemed to surround the caller.  every now and then we have a call from a coyote or two but nothing like this.  they ceased shortly after.
july 10, 2013
i woke up to intermittent regularly intervaled whistles at 2:18 a.M.  the interesting thing about these short blast whistles was that they were as strong from the onset as at their termination.  people build up their whistle as the air being propelled from our lungs builds making the whistle louder then it diminishes in volume upon expelling the last of the oxygen taken in.  these whistles weren���t that way at all.  i lay in bed hearing three more.  i got up to get my parabolic dish.  i tried not to make any noise but on a hardwood floor that is almost impossible.  the whistles stopped immediately.  after the whistling stopped i only heard 1 or 2 coyote calls followed by one dog bark.  i don���t ever recall hearing a dog bark just once.
july 11, 2013
after the most recent activity early, around noon, i thought i���d take a little walk around the property.  on the side of the house, the same side where the orb was seen and the sounds heard i found a footprint that was 14.5��� long and 6.5��� wide.  it was a barefoot left print.  i���m a pretty heavy person and under the same moisture conditions i can���t leave a print that is more than .25��� deep.  the deep spots of this print were the heel and the ball areas of the print were near 2.5��� deep.  the grade the print was on was about 35 degrees and there were no claw marks.  the area was pretty dark but the print was fresh.  i put my fingers into the print and felt the toes and felt deeper impressions in the track where they should be making someone faking the print really too difficult.  i saw no slippage with the footprint.  enclosed you will see an enhanced photo.  it has been enhanced because the area was too dark to get an otherwise good view of it.  
july 12, 2013
not long ago i took a mini vacation with my husband to mt. lassen, ca where we saw sulfur being expectorated from the mountain side.  i walked out into the backyard patio around 5:00 p.M.  the smell of sulfur was so strong that i couldn���t take a breath in and had to go inside.  my husband asked that i close all of the windows.  i lit a match in the house and its odor was identical to what was outside.  hours later the odor seemed to be in front of the house now.  i went to bed at around 10:00 p.M. and the scent remained.  i never got up again to see when it dissipated.
content.summary: Orange orb had higher intensity zones within it.  it reacted to my actions.  it seemed to provoke a situation & collect energy.

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on stanton street in west olive michigan a flash of light to the left of my vehicle caught my attention- i looked up just in time to see this green ball finish shooting to the west toward lake michigan and behind some trees.  i thought to myself that i just seen the biggest, brightest, greenest looking shooting star-i was amazed. the object was faster than any aircraft i had ever seen..Like i said it shot like a shooting star.  i then got to the end of stanton st. and at lake michigan i turned left(south) onto lake shore dr.  as i completed my turn i was shocked to notice the object was probably 100' above the trees and about 200' in front of me hovering over lake shore dr. i drove toward it for about 2 seconds then it shot toward the lake and was gone.  i just had a feeling of amazement, i had never seen an object glow like that or have the ability to move from a standstill to so fast i could not believe.  it was a green glowing sphere/oval i could see a solid outline of the object but the green glow was amazing, the only way i can describe it is as a mist of light around the object. the cloud/mist of light was being emitted about 10-15' out from the entire craft and was constantly moving outward but maintained a perfect round shape around the object.
content.summary: Green light shot across sky then stopped. i turned toward it and it shot off to the west disappearing from view.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 525 pm on february 28th i was traveling home from work on interstate i-95 in central florida county of volusia. this is near the county border of flagler. i was traveling north on the interstate when i noticed what a first looked like a jumbo jet from a distance. and what was alarming it seemed very low, and there are not any airports near by that would manage a jet this large, and this low. as i traveled closer i realized this thing had no wings and looked like a blimp.I am very familiar of the size, and colors of blimps in my area because i'm close to daytona, and there are always blimps in the area for the daytona 500. what was odd typically there is a cockpit under the blimp, and steering fins on the back. this had neither, and there were not any markings what so ever..The object from approx 1.5 miles south looked as large as a blimp and a half. 
as i got closer i noticed a dome on top of the object, and noticed the object was a tan/pewter, or beige in color. no wings or lights. as it flew over the interstate traffic seemed to slow down significantly possibly due to the object, but i'm not sure. the object seemed to be moving about the speed a small aircraft may go. once if flew over the interstate it flew over a wooded area and made a 90 degree turn to the north. this happened rapidly, and once again not wings, or lights were observed. at this point the object seemed to descend closer to the tree tops, and i loss site at that point.
content.summary: Looked twice as large as a blimp. was tan or copper. had a dome on top. no lights no fins on back like a blimp. no markings

content.detailedDescription: I was outside swinging when i saw the ufos appearing the thing that made me notice them was when i was looking at the sky i noticed they were a lot of them there was one after the other i noticed a lot of them didn't make noise they were quiet i thought it was a plane and it wasn't some were small some were big some flew fast some moved slowy only one made a noise it made a humming noise some had green lights red lights some had white orange red lights some of them blinked the lights were bright some of them went to town i was happy to see them i was feeling good i did noticed ringing in  my ears that's been going on since 2012  i kept a eye on them and  i lost sight when they left etc
content.summary: I was outside i saw the ufos there were many of them i wrote down what happened

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to start my car.  after i did, i looked up in the sky to observe the stars becuase it was a very clear and cold night.  the stars appeared brighter than normal.  
  
i looked towards the east and initially saw a meteor streak across the sky and disappear.  a few seconds later i saw a bright orange glow which was moving in a south-westerly direction.  the object appeared to be very high in altitude, and appeared to be descending based on the flight path.  i initially though it was a meteor because the light appeared to be flames.

the object then began to slow down and turn in a northly direction.  as it did, the flames began to disappear.  as the object continued to move in a north direction, the flames completely disappeared.

the object then appeared to be the size as one of the stars in the sky.  the color of the object then appeared to be either orange or red.  it was hard to tell because of the size it became.  i continued to track the obejct until i was unable to see it.  the object made no noise/sounds.

as the object began to get smaller in size, i heard what seemed to be the roar of an airplane.  after i lost sight of the object, i looked to the west in the area of where i was hearing the engine, and saw a plane flying in a north direction. 

there is a military base near by to the south, where military planes constantly fly in and out all times of the day.  i am familiar with what airplanes look like and sound like in the sky.  i have lived in the area for 30 years. 

i did not have a camera to record the event.
content.summary: Initially appeared as a flaming object

content.detailedDescription: On january 4, 2013 at about 9pm my wife, daughter and i were inside my house. we were excited because my 6 year old daughters first tooth just came out. at the same time my 2 great dane's were outside barking. i went outside to my deck to get them to stop barking. as i first stepped out i didn't notice anything right away but maybe about 5 seconds after i went outside i happened to look up and that's when i noticed the ufo. i saw this huge black rectangular shaped object above me. it was going extremely slow and didn't make a sound. i was so confused as to what i was seeing. i actually got my wife and told her to look at what i was seeing. she was carrying my daughter because at this moment they are still excited about her tooth coming out. when she stepped out on to the deck she too couldn't believe her eyes. i took out my cell phone and tried to take a video of it but it was too dark. after a few seconds of me recording it i stopped and tried to take a picture. that too was too dark. my daughter saw the ufo as well but she was so scared that she started crying and telling my wife to bring her back inside. when my wife went back inside i stood on the deck watching this object slowly move in a north west direction. i could remember vividly the object blocking out the stars as it was moving. i saw 3 white lights on both sides of the longer side of the rectangle shaped object, one light in the middle of both sides of the shorter side of the rectangle shape and a white and red light center of the object. the lights were steady. i just kept looking at it until i couldn't see it anymore. as soon as i went inside my house we just kept talking about what we just saw. i never in my whole life saw something that i couldn't explain. i was so confused as to what i saw and to this day i am still confused. i decided to draw a sketch of what i saw shortly after going back inside while it was still fresh in my mind.
content.summary: I was inside my house and heard my dogs barking outside. when i went outside i happened to look up and see the ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Buddy and me stopped on old macon road, and buddy first noticed it as it been behind trees over heavy power lines, and it made turn toward us headed west after it got to junction of power poles, then we both watched it go over, making deep humming sound, no windows, metallic color, misc. color lights like headlights on vehicle, bur no beam emitted.   very ultra modern as it was july or august of  1968, and i have not seen anything this modern to this date except in movies.  no propellor. no thrust, so how it stayed up no idea. more modern than space shuttle oe stealth planes that i have seen.  similar look of robots on moon or mars but much bigger, and we cut have easily hit it with a mid size rock real hard.  about 15-20ft wide, 10-12ft ht., 30 ft length.  no signs of any on board, no portholes to see from.  no abduction, but surely they knew we were only 20 ft. on road watching them go over power lines at a speed of only 5 or so mile per hour.     i have talked with folks that suggested possibly recharging some sort of power system, as they were only about 5 ft above power lines.  we did not follow it for some reason as it headed down road in steady direction.  we just watched it in amazement as it west down the power lines.     here it is almost 46 years later this summer of 2014, and i still think about it most every day..  never to this date i have not seen anything in real life that modern, as it makes what i have seen then seem rather antiquated, and that was 1968.  obviously very advanced beings, no fear to us, but will probably never know who or where they were from.  more modern than any thing i have ever seen till now.  this is the truth.  advanced beings and machine also.   still amazed.  truly   totally advance machine....Who driving?   no idea, as no windows to see into machine.  i really dont think  there is a macine that modern this day in 2014 that i have seen on news.
content.summary: Angular shape metallic no windows deep humming

content.detailedDescription: I was at my sons lacrosse game and when the game was over i happened to look up and saw three lights that appeared unusual to me i continued watching them and pointed them out to my wife.  the front light appeared to be blinking and suddenly the tree lights began to move forward in line and then one by one disappeared.
content.summary: Three lights in a row the lead light appeared to blink the others did not then all three disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling east on hwy 32 out of alma ga around 9:30pm, 6 miles out i noticed what i thought was a c-130 flying low level night time exercises, having served 12 years in the us army i am very familiar with the air craft. as i rolled my window down i could see what i thought was 4 spot lights 24"x24" at the rear of the air craft on which is common whenever you  practice for night time jumps. but what struck me was the air craft was not over taking my highway speed in fact it was matching my speed of 65mph which is impossible. i knew i had a 45* turn up ahead that would put me on highway 203 north, i thought if i could beat the object to that turn i could see what it really was. as i increased my speed and made the turn onto highway 203 the object had jumped ahead of me by a 1/4 of a mile traveling north on highway 203 just inside and over the pine trees off the highway. for the next 6 miles i was unable to gaine back the 1/4 mile i lagged behind even at times of running my truck over 100mph. i then saw the object cross the road ahead of me into a 500 to 700 acrea filed. when i reached the filed i put on my brakes hard pushing me into the ditch as i jumped out of the truck  there was some moon light that slightly light it up giveing it a shape of a long cigar with dim lights all over it and it looked to be larger than the filed. it was a black object that was tilteing on its side slowly when it was vertical it left at the nothing less that the speed of light traveling in a more western direction like when i first noticed it.
content.summary: A large object with fore lights at the rear just above tree tops next to highway matching pace with the speed of my truck, i increased speed to cut the object off a cross road it turned with me keep pace tturned vertical in open filed then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I had a realistic nightmare in the 80's and too i am having difficulty writig in. the space prp place in the 70's
content.summary: Triangle shapped craft hyrogrfic symbols, taken on the ship and taken to their planet, i new them as the dogon

content.detailedDescription: on monday 2-24-13 at 5:13pm eastern time , i was on my lunch break at work sitting in an area where there is a big pane window with no blind and a clear view of the outside.  i was on the 3 floor looking out and  suddenly this black on the bottom and on the sides was copper colored object appeared started to travel behind the building where i was sitting. i  i could not follow the object because i was inside a building but i could judge where it was heading it was south east parell to route 30 in east hempfield township in lancaster pa,  where my job is. this accur  for less then 10 seconds it was traveling very fast. i could not hear anything, i just saw it and could not explain what it was.
content.summary: It appeared suddenly and traveled slow behind where i was looking out the window. i never saw anything like it.  it was not an airplane ,helicopter or anything similiar

content.detailedDescription:
The object i noticed is like a star. it is brighter than any star or planet i have ever witnessed even the north star. i don't have a telescope to determine what it is. i have noticed that it changes spots in the sky just about every night for the past month. i have never seen a star or planet do that, this is why i think it could be something else. everyone thinks im crazy. theres just something odd about it. and i might be over doing it  but i thought you all would like to check it out. thanks
on another point it is so bright i was able to take a pic of it with my phone  never been able to do that with any other star and it show up
content.summary: It looks like a star brighter than the north star

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking a cigarette with my wife after dinner. the brightness of the object caught my attention, then the very low altitude and very fast velocity. the object was devoid of any sound - completely silent. it was an orange-yellow color. there were no strobes, no aircraft marking lights, going at an incredible speed, yet there was no trail of light. the object went completely dark. i stood up hoping to catch a view of where it would be if it reappeared in the same direction of travel, and at the last 2 seconds of view, it lit up again with the same exact color. i reported the sighting to the 193 special operations wing at hia - harrisburg international airport - due to the fact that i was concerned about the potential for an accident with other aircraft -- about 1 hour later. it took me a long time to decide that i should report it to somebody. they were very cordial and took down my witnessed event. they suggested that i report it to my local leos, which we both chuckled at and i politely declined. 
i'm contacting your organization because i feel that this event should also be documented with you. it's almost been a week now & i've concluded that even though it demonstrated many characteristics of a meteorite, there are just a few too many that force me to seriously doubt that it was merely only a space-rock.
please, contact me so that i can clarify what i witnessed and why i have such reservations about this being nothing more than another meteorite.
content.summary: Very fast, very low, lit up - went completely dark, then lit up again

content.detailedDescription: In 1986 at approx 12 in the am after pulling off a county road in prentiss mississippi on hwy 30 heading west when i noticed a huge bright light hoovering in a large soybean field ...My husband at the time dismissed it as a large combine needed for collection of soybeans,, the light was so bright i just kept looking as we pulled onto hwy 30 heading west suddenly the bright very quickly was behind the car hoovering in the passenger side view ..It was as large as a football field and had multiple lights bright surrounded the middle and a large dome light on the bottom had windows all around tho i did not see any beings,,,the huge thing followed the car started sputtering and the radio went into like the am mode i kept screaming to my husband to out run it in a super panic mode and he said he had it to the floor but the car would not get over 20 my husband then stated if we live for another half mile we were pulling into what then was his moms house to see this huge thing but of course i was in extreme panic and just wanted to go home we then sputtered to almost his moms driveway with my eyes on it the entire time it then shifted like up in the air in a blink paused and like a flash it went north like a zip never seen that thing since but it has forever impacted my life as a huge fear of traveling after dark and the largeness of the object made me think we were powerless the closest ive ever seen to the size of that thing was the movie indepence day the large craft that appeared was the exact size it was a city and i know they exsist bigger than a disc ...Did not have a camera would have never thot anyway but i wasnt the only witness as the object appeared again further down hwy 30 hoovering again and a friend heard me talikg about it and she came out excited and loud saying she saw it too at or before sunrise
content.summary: Huge spin top a baby plays with appearance with large lights surrounded with a huge bright light at the base dome base

content.detailedDescription: Loked out to view outside as it was getting lite out-drew my 6th floor drapes -i face south--but lites on left in sky caught my attention since they were only lites in sky at about 530am it is now 610 and it is still there and no other lights in sky to be seen in any direction and where it is stationed no regular airplanes use other than helicopters for weather or traffic or emergencies or summertime private planes.I have reported same object lites before and was asked to take photos .My cel phone shows poorly i asked many friends for a good camers all have newer cel phones but no good cameras and so i cannot send u  good pictures.I cannot afford any hipowered photo equipment-unfortunately--retired-on social security income only.This is second sighting this week -i do not always report because as an oil painter am busy early hours-old people do not sleep late!  i never lose site of object,i just do not sit or stand there for long periods of time ---like now i just looked in direction it was at and at this time 624am it has left .Don't know if this report helps you professional observers .I have nothing to gain by any of these sightings but find them interesting and most of all why more people than a few ladies in my apt.Building have not reported sightings? i think most do not have time to get involved or worried to tell any one. i think if i were not retired i would not have time for this either. respectfuly ,anthony
content.summary: It is over lake michigan at 3 o clock position/east s.

content.detailedDescription: What i am about to describe is the absolute truth , i am willing to take a lie detection test to prove what i am reporting , i am going to keep this simple and to the point , i witnessed a reddish orange sphere following a helicopter over my home at tree top level , as soon as it came over the field in front of my home i felt as if it knew i was watching , a split second later the object disappeared , the helicopter was only displaying a bright search type light aimed directly towards the ground , no other lights were displayed by the helicopter , approximately 50 feet behind the copter was the object , in trail as if following it , i watched the copter overfly my home and disappeared beyond my vision over the treeline behind my home , i did not see the object re-appear after it winked out as soon as i first observed it , all this happened on my front porch of my home , it was very dark outside and       no moonlight or other type of light was observable at the time , this is not the first time i have observed strange lights or military craft in the area of my home and i am firmly convinced there is something i cannot explain in the area of my home that has no easy explanation for occurring on a regular basis
content.summary: I observed an object in trail of a helicopter , redish orange in color , then as soon as it came over my home it disappeared like it seen me watching it

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We witnessed stationary lights white in center moving to outer edges of craft and back again to center with relish lights high lighting the edge of the craft. gained elevation then moved to south (didn't see movement) but seemed to be observing commercial flights.
content.summary: Stationary lights in sky lights from center to outer sides of craft.

content.detailedDescription: Am not a witness i was listening 2 inooro fm live then calls started coming through countless witnesses saw objects lights and a crash no planes on sight or reported missing....One said it looked oval like nothing he had ever seen it crushed with a bang....Am just informing u ....Go and investigate..
content.summary: Check live calls at inooro fm

content.detailedDescription:
While standing outside of apartment building i noticed orb of light below cloud bank. my first sighting was of 1 bright amber orb slowly traveling easterly below cloud bank and making instantaneous turn up into cloud and emerging above cloud bank several seconds later then again instantaneously turning north after appearing above cloud. orb traveled over cloud bank and out of sightline. total time of initial sighting 15 seconds. several seconds after original orb was out of sight, a second orb appeared several hundred feet to the east of original orb and traveled west and then straight up into cloud bank and was not observed again. i don't believe it was original object i observed due to its proximity to first orb. a mid size turboprop plane was traveling in a nw direction during duration of sighting. total time of that sighting was 5 seconds. approximately 6 days later while scanning same area of sky 3 orbs appeared over roof of building traveling north at a constant rate of speed though faster than the original sighting objects. the lead orb was traveling in a straight line though the two behind were swooping around each other and slowing and then speeding up throughout duration of sighting as if playing with each other. same bright lighted amber color as first objects sighted but i believe they were higher in altitude. they traveled into cloud bank in same general line as prior sighting and never reappeared. 
   only two nights later once again scanning for any unusual anomalies i happened to look at the nw sky area and noticed movement of some kind and in the course of the next 5-6 seconds observed 2 large grey round objects traveling at incredible speed nw to se direction from one side of sky to other. i estimate speed at easily over 1500 mph as i have observed military jets and know there is none that can travel at that speed. although it was darker than previous observations the craft were lighter in shade than the cloud cover that appeared seemingly just above them. as they passed over i did very briefly notice some type of darker portions of the bottom of the "discs" lower surfaces. i estimate size of 40-50 feet in diameter due to cloud cover height they seemingly were skimming just under. the speed they were traveling was absolutely incredible and i believe i would have missed them if my eyes didn't lock on to the area in sky where they were moving. i feel these two craft were saucer shaped as i did not notice any portions of the upper shape due to angle of observation and only saw the bottoms of both vehicles that traveled directly side by side, both seemingly exactly the same in size, shape and color. i attempted to get a video with digital camera as i was ready that time but it has been in the single digits here and i suspect lens fogged up and nothing was captured on film. i will keep observing, armed with new digital cam for future sightings and know this is very unusual to have three sightings of this significance in the course of only 10 days, especially in this area of ny. i can hardly believe it myself. good luck
content.summary: 3 seperate sightings over 10 day period-first 2 orbs-second 3 orbs-third bottoms of 2 grey round craft traveling at incredible speed nnw to sse

content.detailedDescription:
I heard a military helicopter coming from the east at about 7:30 p.M. february 27th 2014 in anaheim hills, california.  a large bright white orb was being followed or escorted by some type of military helicopter.  the path was mostly straight with only the sound of the one helicopter heard.  thet both went over head and continued west.  the front white glowing orb slowly vanished from view as i caught it all on video.  then the object seemed to have jumped to the right hand side of the sky instantly; being seen glowing in the clouds that are due for rain.  helicopter continued until out of sight on its own.  video availbale!
please forward to coast to coast a.M.
content.summary: Military helicopter following white orb object from east to west.  silent, no flashing lights then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling down 270 east and i mentioned something about the shape of clouds and about ufo's. he said that he was witnessed to one this month  at  2:30 am..And there wasn't any traffic at that time..It hovered above his ambulance close enough that he got scared and shut his engine so it could not detect him...He lives in middletown, md and works at the local firehouse there...There was another ufo incident in the same general area only there was a backup of traffic when it was witnessed by many travelers and was never mentioned in the news or paper...Are people scared or something?  i am very interested in this invasion of ufo's .You know there are more intelligent life forms out there...
content.summary: Observered by an ambulance driver from middletown, md.
